mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_detail_img_savename, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, b.buy_date, bp.buy_del_state, b.buy_no FROM users u, product p, buyproduct bp, buy b WHERE u.user_no = b.user_no and b.buy_no = bp.buy_no and bp.prod_no = p.prod_no and u.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY b.buy_date desc

SELECT gi.gym_img_savename, g.gym_name, b.booking_price, b.booking_date, bb.b_buy_state, b.booking_state FROM users u, gym g, bbuy bb, booking b, gymimg gi WHERE u.user_no = bb.user_no and b.booking_no = bb.booking_no and g.gym_no = b.gym_no and g.gym_no = gi.gym_img_no and bb.b_buy_state = '결제완료' and u.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY b.booking_date desc

SELECT gi.gym_img_savename, g.gym_name, bb.b_buy_price, bb.b_buy_date, bb.b_buy_player_state FROM users u, gym g, gymimg gi, bbuy bb WHERE u.user_no = bb.user_no and g.gym_no = gi.gym_no and u.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY bb.b_buy_date desc
select buy_no, to_char(buy_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') buy_date, buy_name, buy_ph, buy_address from buy where buy_no = #{buy_no}

select pimg.prod_img_savename, prod.prod_brand, prod.prod_name, bp.prod_no, bp.buyprod_price, bp.count, cs.color, cs.prod_size from buyproduct bp, product prod, prodimg pimg, colorsize cs where bp.prod_no = prod.prod_no and prod.prod_no = pimg.prod_no and prod.prod_no = cs.prod_no and pimg.prod_img_type = 'main' and bp.buy_no = #{buy_no}
